name: part_000
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】#まちゅまちゅ動画 ～インターネット老人会～【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [CXLL4W4w4I8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Sponsor screen and opening credits showing Natsuiro Matsuri's 3D model.
Time signal announcement by Natsuiro Matsuri.
MC section where Natsuiro Matsuri greets the audience and introduces the first song.
Performance of the song 'Senbonzakura' by Natsuiro Matsuri.

subtitles.original: 提供 まちゅまちゅ動画
subtitles.english: Sponsored by Machumachu Douga

subtitles.original: まちゅまちゅ動画
subtitles.english: Machumachu Douga

subtitles.original: 夏色まつりが午後8時頃をお知らせします。
subtitles.english: Natsuiro Matsuri is announcing that it's around 8 PM.

subtitles.original: みんなー！こんばんわっしょーい！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Good evening!

subtitles.original: どうも、ホロライブの清楚担当、みんなのアイドル、夏色まつりでーす！
subtitles.english: I am the one in charge of purity in Hololive, everyone's idol, Natsuiro Matsuri!

subtitles.original: ということで、今回3Dライブなので、じゃーん！
subtitles.english: Since this is a 3D live, ta-da!

subtitles.original: こちらを用意しました。サイリウム！
subtitles.english: I've prepared these. Cyalumes!

subtitles.original: みんなも勿論用意してくれてるよね？
subtitles.english: I'm sure you all have yours ready too, right?

subtitles.original: ということで、最後まで楽しんでいきましょう！
subtitles.english: So, let's have fun until the very end!

subtitles.original: では、早速1曲目聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to the first song.

subtitles.original: 千本桜！
subtitles.english: Senbonzakura!

subtitles.original: 大胆不敵にハイカラ革命
subtitles.english: A bold and fearless Westernized revolution

subtitles.original: 磊々落々 反戦国家
subtitles.english: Open and aboveboard, an anti-war nation

subtitles.original: 日の丸印の二輪車転がし
subtitles.english: Rolling a bicycle with the Hinomaru mark

subtitles.original: 悪霊退散 ICBM
subtitles.english: Evil spirits begone, ICBM

subtitles.original: 環状線を走り抜けて
subtitles.english: Running through the beltway

subtitles.original: 東奔西走なんのその
subtitles.english: Running east and west, thinking nothing of it

subtitles.original: 少年少女戦国無双
subtitles.english: Boys and girls, Sengoku Musou

subtitles.original: 浮世の随に
subtitles.english: Going along with the floating world

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜ニ紛レ
subtitles.english: One thousand cherry blossoms, vanishing into the night

subtitles.original: 君ノ声モ届カナイヨ
subtitles.english: Even your voice cannot reach

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻
subtitles.english: This is a banquet inside a steel cage

subtitles.original: その断頭台で見下ろして
subtitles.english: Looking down from that guillotine

subtitles.original: 三千世界 常世之闇
subtitles.english: The entire universe, darkness of the eternal world

subtitles.original: 嘆ク唄モ聞コエナイヨ
subtitles.english: Even the song of lament cannot be heard

subtitles.original: 青藍の空 遥か彼方
subtitles.english: The indigo sky, far, far away

subtitles.original: その光線銃で打ち抜いて
subtitles.english: Shoot through it with that ray gun

subtitles.original: 百戦錬磨の見た目は将校
subtitles.english: A veteran of a hundred battles, looking like an officer

subtitles.original: いったりきたりの花魁道中
subtitles.english: Coming and going, an oiran procession

subtitles.original: アイツもコイツも皆で集まれ
subtitles.english: That guy and this guy, everyone gather round

subtitles.original: 聖者の行進 ワンっツーさんしっ
subtitles.english: Procession of the saints, one two three four

subtitles.original: 禅定門を潜り抜けて
subtitles.english: Passing through the Zen gate

subtitles.original: 安楽浄土厄払い
subtitles.english: Exorcising evil in the Pure Land of Paradise

subtitles.original: きっと終焉（さいご）は大円団 拍手の合間に
subtitles.english: Surely the end will be a grand finale, amidst the applause

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜ニ紛レ
subtitles.english: One thousand cherry blossoms, vanishing into the night

subtitles.original: 君ノ声モ届カナイヨ
subtitles.english: Even your voice cannot reach

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻
subtitles.english: This is a banquet inside a steel cage

subtitles.original: その断頭台で見下ろして
subtitles.english: Looking down from that guillotine

subtitles.original: 三千世界 常世之闇
subtitles.english: The entire universe, darkness of the eternal world

subtitles.original: 嘆ク唄モ聞コエナイヨ
subtitles.english: Even the song of lament cannot be heard

subtitles.original: 希望の丘 遥か彼方
subtitles.english: Hill of hope, far, far away

subtitles.original: その閃光弾を打ち上げろ
subtitles.english: Launch that flash grenade

subtitles.original: 環状線を走り抜けて
subtitles.english: Running through the beltway

subtitles.original: 東奔西走なんのその
subtitles.english: Running east and west, thinking nothing of it

subtitles.original: 少年少女戦国無双
subtitles.english: Boys and girls, Sengoku Musou

subtitles.original: 浮世の随に
subtitles.english: Going along with the floating world

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜ニ紛レ
subtitles.english: One thousand cherry blossoms, vanishing into the night

subtitles.original: 君ノ声モ届カナイヨ
subtitles.english: Even your voice cannot reach

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻
subtitles.english: This is a banquet inside a steel cage

subtitles.original: その断頭台を飛び降りて
subtitles.english: Leaping off from that guillotine

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜ニ紛レ
subtitles.english: One thousand cherry blossoms, vanishing into the night

subtitles.original: 君が歌い僕は踊る
subtitles.english: You sing and I dance

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻
subtitles.english: This is a banquet inside a steel cage

subtitles.original: さあ光線銃を撃ちまくれ
subtitles.english: Now, fire away with that ray gun
